page.title: 16POPULATION
page.content: {OLD AGE, BIRTHS, RANGE. { {OLD AGE :}IN THE LAST 25 YEARS THE PERCENTAGE OF OLD PEOPLE(65+) HAS GONE UP FROM 3.7% TO 6.4%. OLD PEOPLE ARE LIVING LONGER, MORE ACTIVE LIVES, PROBABLY DUE TO BETTER HEALTH CARE, ETC. {BIRTHS :}THE BIRTH RATE HAS GONE DOWN OVER THE PAST 25 YEARS FROM 16% TO 7.8%. IN SCOTLAND THE RATE HAS GONE DOWN FROM 9% TO 6.2%.THIS DROP IS PROBABLY DUE TO THE FACT THAT WOMEN NOWADAYS PREFER TO WORK OR ARE FORCED TO BY ECONOMIC PRESSURES. {RANGE :} {1960 1985} CHILDREN 38.4% 26.3% 1]14 TEENAGERS 4.8% 10.1% 15]19 YOUNG ADULTS 26% 28.1% 20]34 MIDDLE-AGED 22.7% 22.3% 35]54 ELDERLY 8.1% 13.2% 55+
